comments.text:
It's a "what if we used Djeeta as the MC" episode, 10/10.

This show is good, I want more.
The Gran and Lyria love complex is far better than that of the Djeeta and Lyria Friendship is magic complex they would have if Djeeta was the main character!

More like "It's a beach episode, better make the main character a girl." XD


This episode was a lot of fun. It felt like someone suggested, "what if we animate the main characters doing a low level quest". Djeeta just casually slicing things apart was hilarious. Overall, I think this episode was just as good as the treasure hunting episode. I kinda wish the whole season was like this.

At the [start](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DDGFMu7UQAIlKkh.jpg) we see part of  the [Arcana Duelist](http://game-a.granbluefantasy.jp/assets_en/img/sp/assets/leader/my/150101_sw_1_01.png), [Hermit](http://game-a.granbluefantasy.jp/assets_en/img/sp/assets/leader/my/130201_wa_1_01.png), [Superstar](http://game-a.granbluefantasy.jp/assets_en/img/sp/assets/leader/my/180201_mc_1_01.png), and [Warlock](http://game-a.granbluefantasy.jp/assets_en/img/sp/assets/leader/my/130301_wa_1_01.png) outfits. No wonder she's so strong, Djeeta is at least level 101 in this episode
How'd she unlock Warlock without going through Auguste? And she recruited so many SSRs, what?!
slimeblasting to death for Rank and leeched her way out for the weapon grids and Centrums
Turbowhale Djeeta-senpoi.

Loved how badass she was. And how they all fought the empire guys.

With the level difference and the almost friendly chat, [Pommern](https://i.imgur.com/CQ2sMVu.png) gave a kind of Team Rocket vibe.
Pommern is a good boy.
Meanwhile Gran is still rocking that fighter class even though he has beaten Yggdrasil.
Yeah, I wouldn't be surprised if anime Djeeta was rocking the berserker with the fighter skin as well hah

You called?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0NAQKA0V02_l4Txl2uZ9hAdiD1pB3_--

OMG Best. Episode. Ever. And this is supposed to be an extra episode in an alternate universe.

Djeeta is badass and cuteness combined into one. And all the older girls she's recruited all treat her as their adorable little sister. And the ~~yuri~~ sisterly-love with Lyria is just as cute. HNNG

By replacing Gran with Djeeta, the character dynamic of the entire show has turned from generic Fantasy anime into a CGDCT-Fantasy anime. And it's a beach episode to boot.

The producers of this show have made a serious mistake (besides arranging for this to air in the same day of week as Attack on Titan and Eromanga-sensei) in not including Djeeta in the main story. In fact, I dare say more people would be attracted to the show if Djeeta was in the show or even the main character outright.

I mean, I can understand Gran's inclusion if they're so worried about the Lyria romance dynamic, but why omit Djeeta altogether?

PS This Djeeta is most likely a fairly wealthy P2W player, to have so many SRs and SSRs to make such easy work of the Imperial soldiers.
I wouldn't watch it without gran...

Gran is basically the main character of an Jrpg from 1990-1995. I guess if Djeeta would be in the canon adaptation it would improve the personality of Gran. Would be funny seeing Gran wich is calm most of the time loosing his shit/patience agaisn't Djeeta lol.

"I mean, I can understand Gran's inclusion if they're so worried about the Lyria romance dynamic, but why omit Djeeta altogether?"

Funny, that was what the animation director intended to do, if Cygames didn't reject the idea.
Bad Cygames, bad. To express my discontent, I'm gonna throw something at their windows. Probably my wallet.

They kept the best episode for the end. Cherry on the cake.

> I dare say more people would be attracted to the show if Djeeta was in the show or even the main character outright.

Agreed, even beyond how cool Djeeta was in this episode. We don't have that many action-fantasy anime with a female protagonist, after all.

> The producers of this show have made a serious mistake (besides arranging for this to air in the same day of week as Attack on Titan and Eromanga-sensei) in not including Djeeta in the main story. In fact, I dare say more people would be attracted to the show if Djeeta was in the show or even the main character outright.

majority of GBF playerbase though that directors of anime&Cygames will make Djeeta as Gran's sister or friend and then make her join as ex-captain during mid of season of something. 

But instead they just slapped some totally random ass guy called Aron in first few episode that was suppose to be Gran's friend even if in game there was no such character at all. 

> PS This Djeeta is most likely a fairly wealthy P2W player, to have so many SRs and SSRs to make such easy work of the Imperial soldiers.

Gran is example of new player/newbie who have no clue what to do with crystals (special currency in game) and waste it on stupid things while Djeeta is example of intermediate/veteran player who knew what to do from beginning ([that's why there was scene with all those characters and "gatcha background behind them](http://i.imgur.com/H5dYpad.jpg) and in whole episode you could see cameos of different class job that DJ probably learned so far) ;p the scene where Djeeta was [casually hitting soldiers with sword and smiling](http://i.imgur.com/TdK9JLl.jpg) was pure hilarious

ep13 was pure wink wink to current playerbase instead of new players or people who have no idea about the game at all :D I loved this ep so much

> But instead they just slapped some totally random ass guy called Aron in first few episode that was suppose to be Gran's friend even if in game there was no such character at all.

It's not like there's anything there at all to begin with it's just Gran seeing Lyria fall, helping her fight, dying and then they leave

> that's why there was scene with all those characters and "gatcha background behind them

Hah! I didn't even notice the background lol.

> new players or people who have no idea about the game at all.

Still no idea what the hell I'm doing.

I never have played this game in my life and barely know how it works. To me the episode was just a fun, cliché/trope filled joyride. The casual hitting of soldiers fitted that perfectly fine.
I can't say if the episode was good for players, but for me as a nonplayer it was amazing and good fanservice on top.

> I can't say if the episode was good for players

it was 10/10 for players since we knew who is who and we got lots of popular "waifus" in this episode and majority of players prayed for Djeeta in anime
Djeeta isn't a whale/P2W player. She had a warlock outfit on the clothesline. That's proof enough that she GRINDED like crazy and is why she's so freakin' OP.
You know the game better than I do, so I suppose you're right.
I mean, she has a shitload of SSR's so she might have spent a bit. That said, i'm Rank 151 and i have 40 SSR Characters... :|
She probably just saved her crystal and sparked during a summer event.
She has a bunch of SSRs and event SRs. She definitely whale.
Then I must be whale for having 150+ characters over 1.5 years.
Djeeta has been playing for just a few months though.
If only they also replaced Gran with Djeeta in the OP and ED - it'd be complete.
[Here](http://i.imgur.com/1bPR9Ty.jpg)
They did at the very end of the ED, but yeah, guess they didn't have time/money to replace him everywhere.

As someone that knows nothing about the game and it's characters, having Gran replaced by this Djeeta girl out of nowhere was crazy. I actually had to go back and make sure I did indeed watch ep 12 lol. I love when anime does this.

All in all, this was a surprisingly good show. Not amazing by any means but it certainly wasn't bad. A few episodes even flew by for me and that doesn't happen unless I'm really into it.
ikr.screw.djeeta

> this Djeeta girl

Just a fyi, Djeeta is the female option for the game. So, it's not like it came out of nowhere.

It's probably the animation director's way of saying to Cygames:

"Since you rejected my original idea of having Gran and Djeeta be co-protagonists, let's have a beach episode with Djeeta!"

And yes, I am bitter about this.
It really was a big mistake, so I can understand the bitterness. It would have been so cool with both of them.

In this Extra episode we get to see a crew more representative of the average GBF players [roster] (http://imgur.com/QFidvo3.png). If gran was a new GBF player then this Djeeta is your average player swatting bits and empire soldiers aside like flies. There were also some gags that were introduced from the GBF 4-Koma such as Lyria's [appetite] (http://i.imgur.com/Ul1ypiN.png), [JK Rosetta] (http://i.imgur.com/Gf8muzt.png), and everyone's [obsession] (http://i.imgur.com/v8UNcRj.png) with Vryn. Also we got to see the summer versions of many characters which was a treat, we got:  
[Summer Naru] (https://gbf.wiki/images/1/16/Narmaya_%28Summer%29_A.png)  
[Summer Mary] (https://gbf.wiki/images/6/6a/Mary_%28Summer%29_B.png)  
[Summer Jessica] (https://gbf.wiki/images/5/54/Jessica_%28Summer%29_B.png)  
[Summer Zeta] (https://gbf.wiki/images/d/d2/Zeta_%28Summer%29_A.png)  
[Summer Percival] (https://gbf.wiki/images/1/1a/Percival_%28Summer%29_B.png) Bonus Lancelot and Vane  
[Summer Lunalu] (https://gbf.wiki/images/5/55/Lunalu_%28Summer%29_B.png) for a split second  
[Summer Katalina] (https://gbf.wiki/images/b/b0/Katalina_%28Summer%29_A.png)  
[Summer Io] (https://gbf.wiki/images/5/54/Io_%28Summer%29_B.png)  
[Summer Lowain] (https://gbf.wiki/images/9/93/Lowain_%28Summer%29_B.png)  

We also got a swimsuit for Rosetta and Lyria who currently don't have those skins, hopefully they appear in this years summer event. Also just as a reminder the game is available with a English version for those who would care to try it out.

> n this Extra episode we get to see a crew more representative of the average GBF players roster

are all of those characters are in the same party?!?! I'm still new.
Is the game on Android?
There is a android app available through qoo app, though the game runs better if you play it through the chrome browser on the phone for me so I'd recommend playing that way.
So it's a web game? I should probably look this stuff up. Thanks.

funnily enough, Djeeta's crew also has Tanya, Ippatsu, Suframare, Anna, Walder, and Sara

who also have summer skins
I prefer the [swimsuit version](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/MzvN-IgaeJc/maxresdefault.jpg) of Lyria that is already in the game.

Sends the water/ice mage to go gather ice. 

10/10 logic right there.

^(Also said water mage is the one who would have trouble swimming, more 10/10 logic.)

> Sends the water/ice mage to go gather ice.
> 
> 10/10 logic right there.
>
>Also said water mage is the one who would have trouble swimming, more 10/10 logic.

Shhhhhhhh, es fine.... 

Es totaly fine....

They did mention about ice merchants who are dependent on the natural ice source. So even if Io were to make ice, they won't actually solve the problem of who's hoarding all the ice.

Also, it's quite a distance to that island. Even if Io were an water element mage, she would just exhaust herself. (Not that she was actually useful in the episode where she *didn't* exhaust herself).
Not going to lie, Rosetta looked gorgeous in her swimsuit.

> Not going to lie, Rosetta ~~looked~~ looks gorgeous ~~in her swimsuit.~~

FTFY.
Did they just gender swapped the male MC for the beach episode? And then threw in a couple more female crew members? I'm not gonna lie, this is pure genius. Revolutionary really.
yea, she's the female version of Gran in the game.

I wouldn't have known ;)

I see what you did there. But I wouldn't be surprised if this ends up being true in 6 months' time when Vol 7 is released, when more people want to see Djeeta as the main character.

By then Cygames should use this as an indicator, scrap the canon for this season (i.e. Gran as MC is a "bonus what-if season") and start over with Djeeta as the main character for the next season. :)
This still probably will end up true or maybe even more because iirc each dvd/bd sales is bundled with some in game stuffs and particularly vol7 is bundled with swimsuit gran/djeeta in game skin code

Or maybe go with the animation director's original plan to have BOTH Gran and Djeeta as co-protagonists.

It'd be great! They could still retcon Djeeta's backstory a bit in the anime mainline.(Like Gran's long-lost sister or something.)
"But that doesn't make any--" "Who cares, we all want her to join as a protagonist !"
Volume 6 also has a MC skin, so it will sell more than 5K.

So not only do we get a beach episode but Gran has turned into Djeeta and the female crew size has grown...

Sure why not lol for an extra episode it was fun albeit a bit odd. I like Djeeta and while she seems more competent than Gran I'm happy they chose to use Gran for our MC. 

[Best part of the episode!](http://i.imgur.com/HIfnT2t.png)

Here's hoping for a season 2 and beyond!!
So this episode is the end of S1?
It's an extra episode but yeah this season is done!
Ok thanks,  I kind of figured from the last episode that this season was done, sadly. This show is great and has so much potential...I'm with you,  here's to hoping for S2 And many more
MAL lists 14 episodes for this season, so I think we're getting one more episode.
It's 13 now.
Aww, too bad.
It's gone back up to 14
And now it is back to 13 with [an special.](https://myanimelist.net/anime/35814/Granblue_Fantasy_The_Animation_Special)
14th ep is BD exclusive or so i hear.
Season technically ended last week, this is basically just an ova stuck on the end.
True, but this episode was a pile of flaming garbage.

[](#laughter)

I love it when anime do dumb stuff like this, one of the reason why i loved the Kyoukai no Kanata idol episode x)

Also [Djeeta](http://i.imgur.com/o6bU2b1.png) [timeline](http://i.imgur.com/QvLVBUX.jpg) [is best](http://i.imgur.com/rgZDQXC.png) [timeline!](http://i.imgur.com/Lf0xmv5.png)

This anime was pretty good, probably in my Top 5 of the season which is pretty surprising since i wasn't really looking forward to it and almost didn't start watching it but it was just very enjoyable, a good 8/10 from me and would be perfectly okay with more seasons.
That parrot is so dope. And yet no one but you mentioned him

I'm thrown way off now. So is this end of season 1? I have loved this show since episode 1, the first week, and like so many other anime, I hope it gets a season 2. But it feels like the story is literally just starting,  it would be a huge bummer to not get a S2

~~Play the game~~

You're one of the few people who I've seen that actually liked the show from the start lol. Especially since the early arcs are some of the worst in the story, and it doesn't get good till the later chapters.
The first tow episodes were my favourite out of any fantasy anime I've seen(not many) but It really felt like playing one of the good Tales games or something like that.
it was OVA/bonus episode that's not related to game story unless they decide to make Djeeta canon in next season as Gran's sister or something

> they decide to make Djeeta canon in next season as Gran's sister or something

I hope so.
The sales of BD 1 more than funded a second season ao dont worry itll be back

there is so, so much more
If I do say so myself, this episode threw me wayyyyy off.
Needed more [ＳＯＩＹＡ](https://youtu.be/kGs9_LyTJt8)
What the fuck.
Eventhough i know it is impoosible, i i wish they keep Djeeta for next season. Gran feels so generic...
Djeeta OP. Gran is such a scrub in comparison
It seems like Djeeta is further along the game. She's got way more party members. Probably purchased currency with real money and power leveled everyone.
She has warlock maybe she grinded enough.
She also has the warlock job meaning she already crafted a class champion weapon

Wait so this episode was a extra and now the shows over?  
[](#annoyedkiki)  
what about finding Gran's dad?
Even in the game we have no clue where he is still!
it's just first season. We probably will get more seasons since story in game is far far far far far ahead
[Game story spoilers-ish](/s "In the current latest chapter in the game (89) we still don't know a lot about Gran's dad")
With the strong sales it got we definitely getting 4 more seasons

The anime ended off at Chapter 12 of the in game plot (while also doing a random side diversion to run the Chapter 13-16 plot minus the introduction of a decently important character much later on...)

Gran's father has very little overall reveals through the first act of the story, a few, but not many.

The biggest plot dump we've got about Gran's dad came at around Chapter 70 of the main story when inter-skydom politics get introduced.  And even then, it was only 5-6 lines of dialogue.

Gran-Dad who?

More seriously, Granblue Fantasy is more about the journey than the destination. In other words, collecting waifus and husbandos, scouring sky islands for loot, and beating on Primal Beasts like pinatas for their delicious, delicious drops.
Delicious drops that don't wanna drop. When do I get my Chev sword?

That just means you're not beating them hard enough.

More seriously, I wish that Chev Swords weren't limited in the store.

Love how this episode just casually gave us a quick filling to make everything current lol. I really like duties "what if" episode. I also notice Djeeta is way better than Gran at getting a crew together. Are the creators trying to tell us something about Gran(besides him losing Lyria i'm saying and he still not receiving any upgrades at all...worst RPG character ever, he stuck in default! lol)

Tbf Djeeta's closes are the female version of Gran's, the Rank1 Class "Warrior". And i don't know if it was pointed out to you, but Djeeta's at least Rank 101 because some of the clothes she was wearing were related to some classes. One of those, the Class "Warlock" is only unlock-able after Rank 101. :|
I hate the usual response to some harmless flirting is "chop your dick off".

As much as I enjoyed this episode (DJ is canon to me), the noticeable drop in animation quality is a huge downside for me.

Also disappointed that they hyped the anime with [Katalina and Vira's backstory](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-BbV0QlxKxg) but we never reached the Albion arc.

As an anime-only viewer, I was hella confused but I enjoyed what I saw.

[\o/](http://i.imgur.com/ROyjW2t.jpg)

This was something else and again something to please the fandom of the game. I was mostly bored though and i wouldn't count this to the main series as well.

All in all, really nice series and i hope for a season 2 in the near future.

I like how this episode was a summary of how much better this show would've been with Djeeta.

Either way, pretty fun series. IT got me to finally bother playing the game, so there's that.
I would have dropped the show after episode 1 if Djeeta was the protag god is she intolerable, and no I never played the game.
Oh god... another one fell to salty grinding hell.. welcome to the farmer's life.
It's interesting trying to balance this game with Kamihime Project and still find time to do other things.

I kept waiting for Djeeta to turn into Team because of some spell or something, but then the episode was over and I was real confused. Never played the game or whatever so I didn't know what the fuck was going on...
It was basically High Level whale Djeeta vs low lvl content and beach episode.
Don't know anything about the source material so I had no idea who Djeeta was.
The intro showed that she was the female counterpart of Gran and so it had to be an alternate timeline, but the connection might not be too obvious if you're not used to this kind of thing.

No background whatsoever on the game.

I thought the crew got captured and this was a dream sequence. Kept waiting for the episode villain reveal but then the ED played

Episode of culture, eh? 

[**gochisousama deshita**](#ero)
lmao
Should have changed the OP and ED with Djeeta image, dude image is so out of place.
DJEETA EPISODE? i haven't been watching this show, but I'll probably watch this episode later.
Only watched this anime for those Gran + Lyria moments >.>
Rackam has it made in this timeline. He's the only dude on that ship.
the [dragon knights](http://i.imgur.com/Iqa904t.png) made it in, so not all hope is lost
also Jin, Lowain (and his compadre), Ippatsu and Walder
Everybody gets Walder, though. Except canon Gran, for some reason.
Aka djeeta's harem

I kind get why they did this but I feel like its a huge FU to those of us who want continuity. episode 12 didn't really feel like a closing episode so when i sat down to watch 13 I was supremely confused lol. either way looking forward to season 2.

> episode 12 didn't really feel like a closing episode

Would be strange if it did cause they haven't even finished exploring the 6 main islands... :| ~~there's different skydoms btw~~

> skydoms 

as in kingdoms? So it's not only the Empire? Are you telling me that this goes beyond the FF trope of only having 1 bad guy kingdom?!!?
Yup.
Is this anime better than Chain Chronicle?
Yes.
There's a lot more fanservice for people who played the game in this, but I enjoyed it more than Chain Chronicle, at least.
Slower but the story made more sense to me. I haven't played either game. I thought Chain Chronicle had some really awesome fight scenes but this felt like a real adventure story

I thought the djeeta thing was a cliffhanger for s2 where like Gran has been magically replaced in everyone's memories or something. Until I read all the comments about her being a character option in the game I didn't know existed
WTF happend to Gran did he die?

Why are all of you liking the episode with Djeeta as the main way better than Gran!? I think that Gran is an amazing main character. And most of all how could you possibly compare the sweet loving and innocent love complex of Gran and Lyria to the My Little Pony Friendship is magic complex that they would have if Djeeta was the main character of the show because I know they won't make a love complex with Djeeta and Lyria and even if they did I still stand by Gran! Comment if you agree.
Is there another season of this?
Fuck djeeta why is everyone so obbsesed wjth her.
Same

As someone who's only watched the show, and knows absolute zero about the games. I found this being confusing, and to be frank, utterly pointless and lame. It's the typical waste of an episode on swimsuits that for some reason a ton of animes feel the need to have. I like fan service as much as the next guy, but not only was this EXTREMELY confusing them just discarding Gran and introducing a random, there was a bunch of other randoms (that for some reason just appeared out of thin air in episode 12 without any sort of explanation), and some very crappy plot. I just felt this was completely unnecessary to the anime.
Which part of the ["Extra"](http://i.imgur.com/GVPZFz5.jpg) in the episode title did you not understand?
Extra is not in the title, but I understand it is an extra episode. Didn't change the crap plot and utter pointlessness

>Extra is not in the title

Er... [yes it is](http://i.imgur.com/GVPZFz5.jpg). Please pay attention.

And crap plot my arse.
Shh, some people don't have that thingy called brain. (.)(.)
What you said is rude PotatEXtomatEX. Don't attack people directly or I will report you.
Good for you.
This is the extra episode meant to be pure fanservice for the players of the game.
This is not part of the main story, it is just an "extra", the anime ended last week.
I get that it's an "extra" episode but it wasn't extra in any way to the actual anime and was pure garbage

Nonsense.

Do you even know the definition of "extra"? Meaning it's entirely optional and not actually relevant to the main plot.

I hated episode 13 where they turn Gran into Djeeta because now we don't get get a beach scene with Gran going red with seeing Lydia in a swim suit or see them maybe kissing for the first time. Instead we get something like all girls or guys with no romance between a guy and girl. This Was The Worst Episode Ever!!! Never do this again.
r/anime is really brutal for someone having a different opinion lol
Having different opinions and not having a brain are completely different.  What part of "episode 13 = OVA 1 +/-" do people not understand?
This guy only complained about the character switch though...
And i said that it's not a part of the main series, hence the "Extra".
